body:
Hi, @odeke-em 

Thank you for your response! Now It is clear that ipv6 is not broken at playground.

I don't know how it can be configuration issue on my side, because my request definitely reaches `Google Frontend`. Maybe my subnet is just blocked for some reason, but this ipv6 subnet was never used before.

Btw, if i'm trying to HEAD `https://play.golang.org/`, it returns 200.
```
$ curl https://play.golang.org/ -I -6
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; preload
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2016 19:52:25 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 5573
Alternate-Protocol: 443:quic
Alt-Svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="34,33,32,31,30,29,28,27,26,25"
```
```
$ curl https://play.golang.org/random -I -6
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2016 19:53:41 GMT
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 283
Alternate-Protocol: 443:quic
Alt-Svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="34,33,32,31,30,29,28,27,26,25"
```
```
$curl https://play.golang.org/p/puYYXUdiQL -I -6
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; preload
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2016 19:54:30 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 10
Alternate-Protocol: 443:quic
Alt-Svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="34,33,32,31,30,29,28,27,26,25"
```

So I'm only "blocked" on `/p/*` and only on ipv6, but I can reach `/`.

I have a ipv6-enabled VDS with addr `2a00:a960:1002::372a/48`, result is 403
```
ernado@x:~$ curl https://play.golang.org/p/puYYXUdiQL -I -6
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; preload
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2016 19:57:24 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 10
Alternate-Protocol: 443:quic
Alt-Svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="34,33,32,31,30,29,28,27,26,25"
```

And at home I have 6to4 tunnel (with static public ipv4 addr), and it returns 200!
`2002:d58d:9cec:0:76d4:35ff:fe5c:6c5a/64`
```
curl https://play.golang.org/p/puYYXUdiQL -I -6
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; preload
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 19 Jun 2016 19:59:46 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 6074
Alternate-Protocol: 443:quic
Alt-Svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="34,33,32,31,30,29,28,27,26,25"
```
